content.question: The minarets of the Taj Mahal are used in a somewhat different manner than was traditional for minarets because their function was to

choices.label: ensure that the complex would be visible from all directions
provide a visual balance to the design of the main structure
communicate tales through relief carvings that wind up each minaret
allow visitors to see the layout of the entire complex by climbing to the top

content.answer: provide a visual balance to the design of the main structure
